content:
Calling Health Care Professionals 

- IF you were offered one of the extra doses of the #PfizerBioNTech vaccine (that are currently being discarded) would you have it yourself ?

(off licence at present)  @DrRuthWhitby @Mazsangha @DrJonGriffiths @Dr_Ellie
date:
Quote TweetDr Duncan Robertson@Dr_D_Robertson · Dec 17, 2020Replying to @DrSimonHodes @jim_reed and 3 othersAnd adding on to this, it would be good to know that controls are in place across the country so those extra doses don't get misappropriated.

Hopefully a short term risk as I see that the US FDA has authorized it as reported here

https://statnews.com/2020/12/16/labeling-confusion-led-to-wasted-doses-of-pfizer-covid-19-vaccine-in-first-days-of-rollout/…
